summary: Two HUD styles with many different options.  Supports multiple resolutions!  :)  Includes custom configuration for theit8514\'s Expanded Favorites Menu mod and support with Forsaken32\'s Colored Map Markers mod.  Choose the one you like!
descriptionHtml:
Version History:
==============
v2.0 - Added fading for Option 2 hud.  Download as seperate file from main file.

Resolutions included:
==================
1920 x 1080
1680 x 1050
1600 x 900
1440 x 900
1366 x 768
1280 x 1024
1280 x 800
1280 x 720
1024 x 768
800 x 600

Introduction:
===========
This mod offers two HUD styles, with different options.  It is compatible with Forsaken32\'s [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1327]Colored Map Markers[/url] mod and includes a custom configuration of theit8514\'s [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3545]Expanded Favorites Menu[/url] mod for option 2.  Their mods are amazing!  :)

ipHUD - Option 1

1. Four different types with fade/no fade, and compass at the top/bottom.
2. Health, magicka, and stamina meters, top to bottom, are all at the lower-left corner. I also reduced the size of each one.
3. The Favorites menu is slightly above the health meter. This way it doesn\'t overlap with anything.
4. The stamina meter doesn\'t flash anymore, when depleted.
5. Enemy health and name still appear at the top of the screen.

ipHUD - Option 2

1. Health, magicka, and stamina meters are reduced in size and moved closer to the center of the screen.  Option for fading or no fading.
2. Compass is located at the bottom.  Option to use Forsaken32\'s Colored Map Markers.
3. Favorites menu is a specific configuration of theit8514\'s Expanded Favorites Menu.
4. Enemy health and name still appear at the top of the screen.
5. Both stamina and magicka meters flash, when depleted.

In the future I may add support for resolutions higher than 1920 x 1080, but I can\'t at the moment.  Sorry about that.  Please leave a comment and if you have a bug, let me know.  I will try my best to fix it.

Known Issue: The health meter doesn\'t fade right to left in Option 1.   Still working on that.  >_>

Credits:
=======
Orava - Made a [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2938]HUD mod[/url] of his own that inspired me to do this.
Forsaken32 - Made the [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1327]Colored Map Markers[/url] mod.
theit8514 - Created the amazing [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3545]Expanded Favorites Menu[/url] mod.

Thank you!  :D
author: IcePenguin
